achievement: as an child survived a night in the wild with only a spear
captured a live bison with only a rope
touched together the two ends of an iron rod with their bare hands
turned the stone idol statue to face the sunrise
beat up a bear using only their hands
has mastered the art of cow punching
killed and then devoured six wild boars on one sitting
buried a slave and a hoard of gold in a secret place
was born weak and scrawny, but proved otherwise on the battlefield
drank a fire giant under the table
ran across the mountain pass barefoot in midwinter
got their spirit tattoo by wrestling the shaman into submission
won a drinking contest against an entire clan of gnomes
once when starving, killed their own spirit animal and ate it
quirk: goes naked from the waist up and refuses all forms of shelter
collects bones to build himself a throne with them
adds the names of all his defeated foes to his own name
makes clothes out of the hides of his enemies, because “their anger keeps him warm”
loves to sing battle songs in solemn moments
turns a deep shade of purple when raging in battle
only speaks of himself as “the demon”
has a tattoo of himself that has a tattoo of himself, and can make them all dance
makes a new scar on himself to commemorate each victory
recites his own saga out loud every day
thinks ranged weapons are for sissies
will only eat things he has killed himself, preferably raw
fights alone to avoid sharing the glory of victory with others
likes to eat things when they are still alive and wiggling
takes a bite from the liver of every kill to inherit its strength
has no respect for the dead and finds the idea of graves and monuments ridiculous
has a code of honor so complex that it often gets confusing
will refuse to fight if the enemy is unarmed
believes babies are born from sheer willpower
will let their enemies live if they tell him a good joke
likes to open barrels of ale by bear-hugging them
incantation: By sheer concentration of rage the power of anger manifests itself as magic energy
The will of the caster is so strong that magic is willed into existence
By the use of the powers of their ancestors the caster invokes energy into existence
